attributes.action: We have ALWAYS and always will use the word YID...do they know the history of our beloved Tottenham Hotspur
attributes.additional_details: why after so many years are we being told to refrain from saying the word YID.....we have adopted this as a proud sign that we support this club.History acknowledges that it used to be used against our fans,as a means of trying to incite us into violence.But times have changed....remember,we have ,or supposed to have,freedom of speach in this country!!
